title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, a classic writing tool with a rich heritage and unmatched performance. Featuring 30 Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow pencils, these gems are perfect for your creative endeavors.

The core of each pencil boasts an exclusive #2 graphite formula, delivering smooth performance with every stroke. The thick, consistent graphite core ensures lines that remain true and bright. Wrapped in premium wood, sustainably harvested from responsibly managed forests, these pencils not only write beautifully but also add a touch of elegance to your workspace.

The lacquered, matte golden yellow finish adds both style and functionality. Each pencil comes with a pre-sharpened point, allowing you to jump right into your creative project without any delay. The latex-free eraser, with its signature green & gold ferrule, removes marks completely without smudging, ensuring accuracy and precision throughout your work.

Each Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencil is PMA certified non-toxic, ensuring the safety of you and the environment. With a tradition that spans over 100 years and preferred by teachers, these pencils are more than just a writing tool – they're a testament to craftsmanship and creativity.

Join the countless artists, students, and educators who have relied on Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils for generations. Experience the perfect blend of tradition, quality, and innovation in every pencil. Get your set today!

**Advertisement Description:**

Discover the timeless appeal of Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened with 2 HB Soft, in a pack of 30. These pencils boast an exclusive #2 graphite formula for smooth performance and thick, consistent lines, ensuring your artistic creations shine. Premium wood, sourced from responsibly managed forests, adds a touch of elegance while the golden yellow lacquered, matte coating provides a sophisticated finish.

Pre-sharpened to save you time, each pencil comes with an eraser that is latex-free and smudge-free, allowing for effortless corrections without leaving unsightly smudges on your work. The green & gold ferrules add a signature touch to these pencils, making them not only functional but also visually appealing.

As a PMA certified non-toxic product, Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils are safe for you and the environment. With over 100 years of tradition behind this brand, preferred by teachers, you can trust that every pencil is crafted to meet the highest standards of quality. Add a box of these iconic pencils to your collection today!

**Advertisement:**

Crafted from premium, responsibly sourced wood and finished with a golden yellow lacquered matte coating, these pencils not only look great but also write beautifully. Each pencil comes pre-sharpened, allowing you to start drawing right away without the hassle of sharpening.

Our latex-free eraser, featuring a signature green & gold ferrule, removes marks completely without smudging, making corrections effortless and mess-free. Ticonderoga pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, ensuring safety for every user.

With a rich tradition of over 100 years in craftsmanship, Ticonderoga is the preferred choice among teachers and students alike. Join the millions who have enjoyed these high-quality pencils. Order your pack today!

**Advertisement:**
